name: sign:here
description: Natural language chat‚Äêbot that allows people to submit legal documents as context and ask any questions regarding the documents. Utilizes semantic search, vector similarity search, and context injection to provide users with the highest accuracy response.
technologies: React, Javascript, Python, Flask, co:here, Qdrant

name: write:here
description: Scans an image file for handwritten text, parses it into digital text using AI-powered technology, and sends it as an email. Submitted to Hackville 2023 and won Most Creative Use of Github.
technologies: React, Typescript, Next.js, Google Cloud, Google Vision API, co:here

name: Cafe Management System
description: Retail management system (RMS) that handles basic cafe operations efficiently. Features a JWT authentication system, mailing system, and CRUD operations for managing categories, products, bills, and staff.
technologies: Angular, Typescript, HTML5, SCSS, Spring Boot, Java, Maven, MySQL

name: Apollo
description: App that makes Cerebral Palsy (CP) assessments more accessible by using machine learning and computer vision to determine early markers as stated by the HINE model.
technologies: Python, OpenCV, Mediapipe, scikit-learn, NumPy, Pandas
